main_topic.author: ISAKA Tsuyoshi
main_topic.title: Submission Failed: Previously Successful File Fails Sporadically
main_topic.content:
My previously successful submission has now failed. I am unable to check the error logs(404).

Only two agents are displayed.

I submitted the same file five times, and it failed only once.

Does anyone have any clues or suggestions?

comments.author: loh-maa
comments.content: I think same issue here, hard to tell the cause, and what else to do than just try again..
comments.date: Posted 10 days ago  ·  2nd in this Competition

reply.author: ISAKA TsuyoshiTopic Author
reply.content: I agree, it seems like a random system error that occurred. It's frustrating not being able to see the logs.
reply.date: Posted 9 days ago  ·  521st in this Competition

comments.author: Andrew Tratz
comments.content: Having a similar issue - failing with 404 error when clicking on logs. Is this still happening frequently for you?
comments.date: Posted 11 days ago  ·  119th in this Competition

reply.author: ISAKA TsuyoshiTopic Author
reply.content: Thank you for your comment! It's the same phenomenon. Although not frequent, I've experienced it twice.
reply.date: Posted 10 days ago  ·  521st in this Competition
